# stopValidating()

**Instance Method**

Stops the active validation operation.

## Declaration

```swift
func stopValidating()
```

## Discussion

You can call this method at any time, even within the validator’s callback to its handler.

Calling this method stops validation and changes the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptionConversionValidator/status-swift.property] value to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptionConversionValidator/Status-swift.enum/stopped].

## Validating captions

- **validateCaptionConversion(warningHandler:)**: Validates the object’s captions.
- **warnings**: The collection of warnings the validator encountered.
- **AVCaptionConversionWarning**: An object that represents a conversion warning produced by a validator.
